Type.BattleDialog: Let’s see… Are there any veins left for me to taste?
Holding back the pain of this thirst… is not a pleasing sight.
Not my most satisfying meal.
This thirst… has no…
It was just an empty husk. Not a drop of blood remained inside it…
Death is fair… For it dances with us all.
The fate of predation shines over us without discrimination.
Tis a shame… This wasn’t the taste I was looking for.
Both you and I merely empty the glass in our hands to sate our desires, isn’t that so?
Ah… Think you can stop me with that?
Temper your fear. I would advise you to direct your attention to the present.
It would seem that we have taken care of our business.
You simply lacked the capability to fight on.
You managed to hold out for a good length of time.
I am certain you gave it your all. Well done.
No one will blame you.
May you lie in peace, light as your body may have been.
I wish for you to have eternal rest this time.
That aside… They’re our guests—so we should do our best to receive them.
Good work, everyone. …I wonder how the other floors are doing.
We can’t back off like this…!
I’ll resist until the end…
It’s not over as long as one of us is alive.
Don’t get nervous, don’t get nervous…
That should make things a little easier…
Has that Bloodfiend… turned into a book?
She’s got a Color under her control… Doesn’t that spell trouble for us…?
Is everyone alright? Tell me if there’s something wrong.
Sorry… I can’t go on any longer…
The remaining personnel should take more caution.
We can’t let the fruit of all our laboring go up in smoke…
I’m still okay…
It could’ve gone wrong if I was one bit slower…
Are the Bloodfiends… all this strong?
A Vermilion… Cross. That’s gotta be him. The giant cross he has…
…I don’t feel too good about this.
I can still go on… I can…
…Maybe we let our guard down.
Don’t do anything reckless.
We can’t let them stop us here.
Even if he’s just a shell of his former self, the power is still there…
I feel kinda dizzy.
…Who’s that next to her?
I’m all worn out… We should tidy this up and get a move on.
They got… me…
Could there be an alternative…?
I shouldn’t have played them down just because there are only two of them…
We should think of a way to gain ground against them.
To think that we took down the Color we’d only heard of…
For sure… That’s not a power any ordinary person could possess.
